'''Recipes''' are [[item]]s that are needed for [[cooking]]. Once used, the player will learn to make the associated dish.

Most dishes must be learned through recipes; however, a couple are available from the start of the game and therefore do not have an associated recipe item. These are:
{{column|2|
*{{Item|Chicken-Mushroom Skewer|30}}
*{{Item|Fisherman's Toast|30}}
*{{Item|Fried Radish Balls|30}}
*{{Item|Mondstadt Grilled Fish|30}}
*{{Item|Radish Veggie Soup|30}}
*{{Item|Satisfying Salad|30}}
*{{Item|Steak|30}}
*{{Item|Sweet Madame|30}}
*{{Item|Teyvat Fried Egg|30}}
}}

Recipes can be acquired through through [[Quests]], [[Domains]], [[Reputation]], [[Chests]] or by buying them in [[Shops]]. In the case of the latter, waiting until the Reputation of the shop's Region has been increased to Level 4 can reduce the [[Mora]] cost.

The recipe's rarity is equal to the dishes rarity.
